overview: Image by Carlos Casas.  Double screen projection with live soundtrack.  Images and sound captured on location.  Somewhere in the tundra,  Chukotka Region,  Northeastern Siberia,  Russian Federation.  Music by Prurient.  Published by Von Archives.  N 66° 37’ 916,  W 172° 40’ 353,  Sept 2006.
title: Vezdekhod
